com.mambu.apisdk.services

Class DocumentTemplatesService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mambu.apisdk.services.DocumentTemplatesService

  • public class DocumentTemplatesService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class which handles API operations for retrieving document templates for Mambu Entities. Getting Templates for the following entities is currently supported: LoanAccount and SavingsAccount Document Templates API currently supports: GET Populated Account Templates (see MBU-10631 - As a Developer, I want to get populated Account Document Templates via APIs) and GET Populated Transaction Templates (see MBU-10632 - As a Developer, I want to get populated Transaction Document Templates via API )
    Author:
    mdanilkis

    • Method Detail

      • getPopulatedLoanTemplate

        public java.lang.String getPopulatedLoanTemplate(java.lang.String loanAccountId,
                                                 java.lang.String templateKey,
                                                 java.lang.String startDate,
                                                 java.lang.String endDate)
                                          throws MambuApiException
        Get populated account document template for a loan account and a given template key
        Parameters:
        loanAccountId - id or encoded key for the loan account. Must not be null
        templateKey - template encoded key. Should be a valid product document template encoded key. Must not be null
        startDate - Start date. Mandatory for product documents that "Include Transactions History" (i.e. documents of DocumentTemplateType.ACCOUNT_WITH_TRANSACTIONS type) and can be only specified for documents of this type. If specified, must be less or equal to endDate
        endDate - End date. Mandatory for product documents that "Include Transactions History" (i.e. documents of DocumentTemplateType.ACCOUNT_WITH_TRANSACTIONS type) and can be only specified for documents of this type.
        Returns:
        populated HTML template for the loan account
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getPopulatedSavingsTemplate

        public java.lang.String getPopulatedSavingsTemplate(java.lang.String savingsAccountId,
                                                    java.lang.String templateKey,
                                                    java.lang.String startDate,
                                                    java.lang.String endDate)
                                             throws MambuApiException
        Get populated account document template for a savings account and a given template key
        Parameters:
        savingsAccountId - id or encoded key for the savings account. Must not be null
        templateKey - template encoded key. Should be a valid product document template encoded key. Must not be null
        startDate - Start date. Mandatory for product documents that "Include Transactions History" (i.e. documents of DocumentTemplateType.ACCOUNT_WITH_TRANSACTIONS type) and can be only specified for documents of this type. If specified, must be less or equal to endDate
        endDate - End date. Mandatory for product documents that "Include Transactions History".(i.e. documents of DocumentTemplateType.ACCOUNT_WITH_TRANSACTIONS type) and can be only specified for documents of this type.
        Returns:
        populated HTML template for the savings account
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

        Get populated transaction document template for a loan account
        Parameters:

        templateKey - template encoded key. Should be a valid product document template encoded key. Must not be null
        transactionId - a valid transaction ID or encoded key. Must not be null
        Returns:
        populated HTML template for the transaction
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • isSupported

        Returns:

      • getPopulatedEntityTemplate

        public java.lang.String getPopulatedEntityTemplate(MambuEntityType parentEntity,
                                                   java.lang.String entityId,
                                                   java.lang.String templateKey,
                                                   java.lang.String startDate,
                                                   java.lang.String endDate)
                                            throws MambuApiException
        Convenience method to get populated document template for a given parent entity and a given template id
        Parameters:
        parentEntity - MambuEntityType for which document templates are retrieved. Example, MambuEntityType.LOAN_ACCOUNT. Must not be null. Currently can be only MambuEntityType.LOAN_ACCOUNT or MambuEntityType.SAVINGS_ACCOUNT
        entityId - entity id or encoded key for the parent entity. Example, loan account id for a MambuEntityType.LOAN_ACCOUNT. Must not be null
        templateKey - template encoded key. Should be a valid product document template encoded key. Must not be null
        startDate - Start date. Mandatory for product documents that "Include Transactions History". Can only be be specified for documents that "Include Transactions History". startDate <= endDate
        endDate - End date. Mandatory for product documents that "Include Transactions History". Can only be be specified for documents that "Include Transactions History". startDate <= endDate
        Returns:
        populated HTML template for the parent entity
        Throws:
        MambuApiException

      • getPopulatedEntityTransactionTemplate

        public java.lang.String getPopulatedEntityTransactionTemplate(MambuEntityType parentEntity,
                                                              java.lang.String entityId,
                                                              java.lang.String templateKey,
                                                              java.lang.String transactionId)
                                                       throws MambuApiException
        Convenience method to get populated transaction document template for a given parent entity (LoanAccount or SavingsAccont)
        Parameters:
        parentEntity - MambuEntityType for which document templates are retrieved. Example, MambuEntityType.LOAN_ACCOUNT. Must not be null. Currently can be only MambuEntityType.LOAN_ACCOUNT or MambuEntityType.SAVINGS_ACCOUNT
        entityId - entity id or encoded key for the parent entity. Example, loan account id for a MambuEntityType.LOAN_ACCOUNT. Must not be null
        templateKey - template encoded key. Should be a valid product document template encoded key. Must not be null
        transactionId - a valid transaction ID or encoded key. Must not be null
        Returns:
        populated HTML template for the transaction
        Throws:
        MambuApiException
